2人で手分けして「星のかけら」を集めよう！
Fliege mit jemandem als Pärchen zusammen und sammle die "Sternenfragmente"!
Team up in pairs and collect the "Star Fragments!"
Regroupez-vous par paire et collectez les "Fragments d'étoile" !
Trova un partner per formare una coppia e raccogliere i "Frammenti di stella"!
¡Formad parejas para buscar los "fragmentos de estrella"!
Team up in pairs and collect the "Star Fragments!"
Team up in pairs and collect the "Star Fragments!"
Team up in pairs and collect the "Star Fragments!"
Team up in pairs and collect the "Star Fragments!"
Team up in pairs and collect the "Star Fragments!"

フライトゲームに参加するには、
以下のいずれかのアイテムを装備してください。
・天上人のビキニドレス ・天上人のパーカー
・天上人の星空ビキニ
※ リストには、発売予定で、
 まだストアにないアイテムも含まれています。
 詳しくはwww.granzellagames.comをごらんください。

Bitte rüste einen der folgenden Gegenstände aus,
um am Spiel teilnehmen zu können.
- Himmlisches Kleid in Bikini-Optik
- Himmlische leichte Jacke
- Himmlischer Badeanzug
* Diese Liste enthält Gegenstände, die noch nicht zum Kauf erhältlich sind.
Für weitere Einzelheiten schau auf www.granzellagames.com vorbei.

To participate in a flight game,
please equip one of the following items.
- Celestial Bikini Dress
- Celestial Light Jacket
- Celestial Starry Sky Swimsuit
* The list includes items scheduled to be available for purchase that are not in the store yet.
For details, please visit www.granzellagames.com.

Pour participer à un jeu de vol,
veuillez équiper l'un des objets suivants.
- Robe bikini céleste
- Gilet céleste
- Maillot de bain céleste ciel étoilé
* La liste inclut des objets qui sont prévus pour être disponibles à l'achat mais ne sont pas encore en magasin.
 Pour plus de détails, veuillez consulter www.granzellagames.com.

Per partecipare in un gioco in volo,
occorre equipaggiare uno dei seguenti oggetti:
- Vestito celestiale con bikini
- Veste celestiale
- Costume da bagno celestiale decorato con cielo stellato
* Questa lista comprende oggetti che verranno messi in vendita, ma che al momento non sono disponibili nel negozio.
 Per maggiori informazioni, visitare il sito www.granzellagames.com.

Para participar en un juego de vuelo,
has de equiparte con uno de los siguientes artículos.
- Vestido bikini celestial
- Chaqueta celestial
- Bañador celestial del cielo estrellado
* La lista incluye artículos que no están en la tienda, pero que se pondrán a la venta en el futuro.
Para más detalles, visita www.granzellagames.com

To participate in a flight game,
please equip one of the following items.
- Celestial Bikini Dress
- Celestial Light Jacket
- Celestial Starry Sky Swimsuit
* The list includes items scheduled to be available for purchase that are not in the store yet.
For details, please visit www.granzellagames.com.

コース上に浮かんでいる、色とりどりの星のかけら。\nパートナーと一緒に集めると、様々なリワードが手に入ります。\n服装によって、出現する星のかけらの色や数が変化します。

Auf der Route schweben zahlreiche bunte Sternefragmente.\nWenn du viele von ihnen mit deinem Partner zusammen einsammelst, könnt ihr Belohnungen erhalten!\nDie Farbe und Anzahl der Sternenfragmente hängen von eurem Outfit ab.

Colourful star fragments are floating over the course.\nBy collecting them with your partner, you can obtain various rewards.\nThe colour and number of star fragments that appear change based on your outfit.

Des fragments d'étoile colorés flottent le long du parcours.\nEn les collectant avec votre partenaire, vous pouvez obtenir diverses récompenses.\nLa couleur et le nombre de fragments d'étoile qui apparaissent changent selon votre tenue.

Durante il percorso vedrai dei Frammenti di stella fluttuare nell'aria.\nSe li raccogli con l'aiuto di un partner, potrai ottenere vari premi.\nIl colore e il numero di Frammenti di stella che trovi durante il percorso variano in base al tuo abbigliamento.

Encontrarás coloridos fragmentos de estrella flotando por el circuito.\nPodrás obtener diversas recompensas recogiéndolos junto a tu compañero.\nEl color y el número de fragmentos de estrella que aparecen variarán según tu atuendo.

Colorful star fragments are floating over the course.\nBy collecting them with your partner, you can obtain various rewards.\nThe color and number of star fragments that appear change based on your outfit.

Colorful star fragments are floating over the course.\nBy collecting them with your partner, you can obtain various rewards.\nThe color and number of star fragments that appear change based on your outfit.

Colorful star fragments are floating over the course.\nBy collecting them with your partner, you can obtain various rewards.\nThe color and number of star fragments that appear change based on your outfit.

Colorful star fragments are floating over the course.\nBy collecting them with your partner, you can obtain various rewards.\nThe color and number of star fragments that appear change based on your outfit.

Colorful star fragments are floating over the course.\nBy collecting them with your partner, you can obtain various rewards.\nThe color and number of star fragments that appear change based on your outfit.
七夕フライトへようこそ\n 南の島の空へ飛び立ち 空から眺める幻想的な風景をお楽しみください\n ひとりで または 誰かとペアを組んで ふたりで参加することができます
Willkommen zum Tanabata-Flug!\nFliege im Sternenhimmel der Südseeinsel und genieße die fantastische Aussicht!\nDu kannst alleine oder mit einem Partner teilnehmen.
Welcome to Tanabata Flight\n Soar into the Southern Island sky, and enjoy the fantastic view from above!\nYou can participate alone or join with someone else to form a pair.

Bienvenue au vol de la Tanabata\nÉlevez-vous dans le ciel de l'île Australe et profitez de la vue fantastique de dessus !\nVous pouvez participer seul(e) ou avec quelqu'un d'autre pour former une paire.
Benvenuti al Volo di Tanabata!\nVola sull'Isola del sud e goditi il fantastico panorama visibile dall'alto!\nPuoi volare da solo o in coppia con un partner.

Bienvenido al vuelo de Tanabata\n¡Planea por el cielo sobre las islas de los mares del sur, y disfruta del fantástico paisaje a vista de pájaro!\nPuedes participar solo o por parejas, acompañado por otra persona.
Welcome to Tanabata Flight\n Soar into the Southern Island sky, and enjoy the fantastic view from above!\nYou can participate alone or join with someone else to form a pair.
Welcome to Tanabata Flight\n Soar into the Southern Island sky, and enjoy the fantastic view from above!\nYou can participate alone or join with someone else to form a pair.
Welcome to Tanabata Flight\n Soar into the Southern Island sky, and enjoy the fantastic view from above!\nYou can participate alone or join with someone else to form a pair.
Welcome to Tanabata Flight\n Soar into the Southern Island sky, and enjoy the fantastic view from above!\nYou can participate alone or join with someone else to form a pair.
Welcome to Tanabata Flight\n Soar into the Southern Island sky, and enjoy the fantastic view from above!\nYou can participate alone or join with someone else to form a pair.
空を飛ぶ仲間を募集しますか？
フライト中のBGMを選べます
Seleziona la musica di sottofondo in volo
Seleccionar la música para el vuelo
You can select the BGM of the flight
可以選擇航行中的背景音樂
可以選擇航行中的背景音樂
フライトしているところを動画で保存しますか？\n ※動画を撮影している間 写真撮影はできなくなります\n ※HDDの容量が十分でない場合 動画は保存できません

Du kannst eine Videoaufnahme deines Fluges mit einem Partner speichern\n * Während das Video aufgenommen wird, können keine Fotos geschossen werden. \n * Videos können nur gespeichert werden, wenn genügend Platz auf der Festplatte vorhanden ist.
You can save a video of you and your partner flying\n * While recording video, you will not be able to take pictures. \n * Videos cannot be saved if you lack sufficient HDD space.

Vous pouvez sauver une vidéo de vous et de votre partenaire en vol\n * En enregistrant la vidéo, vous ne serez pas capable de prendre des photos. \n * Les vidéos ne peuvent pas être sauvées si vous manquez d'espace disque dur.

Puoi salvare un video su di te e il tuo compagno mentre volate\n * Durante la registrazione di un video, non sarà possibile scattare foto. \n * I video non possono essere salvati se non c'è spazio a sufficienza sull'hard disk.
Puedes guardar un vídeo de tu vuelo con tu compañero\n * Mientras estés grabándolo, no podrás sacar fotos.. \n * Los vídeos no podrán guardarse si no tienes suficiente espacio en el disco duro.
You can save a video of you and your partner flying\n * While recording video, you will not be able to take pictures. \n * Videos cannot be saved if you lack sufficient HDD space.
You can save the pair flight as video\n ※When video is being recording, photo taking is disabled\n ※If your HDD does not have enough space, video cannot be saved.
두 사람이 비행하고 있는 것을 동영상으로 보존할 수 있습니다\n ※동영상을 촬영하고 있는 동안 사진 촬영은 할 수 없습니다\n ※HDD의 용량이 충분하지 않을 경우 동영상은 보존할 수 없습니다
可以把二人飛行的情景以影片形式儲存起來。\n ※錄製影片時將不能拍照。\n ※若HDD的容量不足，影片將不獲儲存。
可以把二人飛行的情景以影片形式儲存起來。\n ※錄製影片時將不能拍照。\n ※若HDD的容量不足，影片將不獲儲存。
どんな飛び方でフライトしますか？
How would you like to fly?
How would you like to fly?
What way do you want to fly?
パートナーは ふたりのフライトを動画で撮影しようとしています\n あなたも 動画を撮影しますか？
Dein Partner versucht, ein Video von eurem Flug aufzunehmen.\n Möchtest du auch ein Video aufnehmen?
Your partner is trying to record a video of the two of you flying.\n Would you like to record a video as well?
Votre partenaire essaie d'enregistrer une vidéo de vous deux en train de voler.\n Voulez-vous enregistrer une vidéo également ?
Il tuo compagno vuole registrare un video di voi due mentre volate.\n Vuoi registrare anche tu un video?
Tu compañero está tratando de grabar un vídeo vuestro volando.\n ¿Quieres grabar tú también un vídeo?
Your partner is trying to record a video of the two of you flying.\n Would you like to record a video as well?
Your partner is going to take a video for your flight\n Do you also want to take a video?
파트너는 두 사람의 비행을 동영상으로 촬영하려고 합니다\n 당신도 동영상을 촬영하겠습니까?
你的拍檔將錄下你們的航行影片。\n 你也要錄製影片嗎？
你的搭檔將錄下你們的航行影片。\n 你也要錄製影片嗎？
フライト開始まで あと%3d秒
一緒にフライトするパートナーをつのっています…
Suche nach einem Partner zum gemeinsamen Fliegen...
Looking for a partner to fly with...
Recherche d'un partenaire avec qui voler...
In cerca di un compagno con cui volare...
Buscando una pareja con la que volar...
Looking for a partner to fly with...
Waiting for someone to join the flight as your partner...
正在招募一起飛行的拍檔…
正在招募一起飛行的拍檔…
誰に参加を申し込みますか？\n※パートナーをつのっている人がいない場合 リストは空欄になります\n（[SQUARE]ボタンでリストを更新することができます）
Die folgenden Leute suchen jemanden zum gemeinsamen Fliegen.\n Wem möchtest du eine Anfrage schicken?
The following people are looking for someone to fly with.\n To whom would you like to send a request?
Les personnes suivantes cherchent quelqu'un avec qui voler.\n À qui voudriez-vous envoyer une demande ?
Le seguenti persone stanno cercando qualcuno con cui volare.\n A chi di loro vorresti inviare una richiesta?
Las siguientes personas están buscando a alguien con quien volar.\n ¿A quién le quieres enviar una solicitud?
The following people are looking for someone to fly with.\n To whom would you like to send a request?
The following people are waiting for someone to have a flight together.\n Who do you want to invite?
다음의 분들이 함께 비행할 파트너를 모집하고 있습니다\n 누구에게 참가를 신청하겠습니까?
以下的玩家正在招募一起飛行的拍檔\n 要邀請誰嗎？
以下的玩家正在招募一起飛行的拍檔\n 要邀請誰嗎？
[ONLINEID]さんの開始を待っています…
[ONLINEID]さんから 参加申し込みがきています\n この方と 一緒にフライトしますか？
[ONLINEID]\n hat dir eine Anfrage nach einem gemeinsamen Flug geschickt. Möchtest du sie annehmen und gemeinsam fliegen?
[ONLINEID]\n has sent you a request to join you. Would you like to fly together?
[ONLINEID]\n a envoyé une requête pour vous rejoindre. Voudriez-vous voler ensemble ?
[ONLINEID]\n ti ha mandato una richiesta di partecipazione. Vuoi volare insieme?
[ONLINEID]\n te ha enviado una petición para unirse a ti. ¿Te gustaría que volaseis juntos?
[ONLINEID]\n has sent you a request to join you. Would you like to fly together?
[ONLINEID]\n invites you to have a flight Do you want to join?
[ONLINEID]\n 邀請你一同參加飛行旅程 你要一起參加嗎？
[ONLINEID]\n 邀請你一同參加飛行旅程 你要一起參加嗎？
[ONLINEID]さんへ 参加を申し込みました\n 相手の了承を待っています…
[ONLINEID] wurde eine Anfrage geschickt.\n Warte auf die Zustimmung des Partners...
Request sent to [ONLINEID].\n Waiting for your partner's approval...
Demande envoyée à [ONLINEID].\n En attente de l'approbation de votre partenaire...
Richiesta inviata a [ONLINEID].\n In attesa della conferma del tuo partner...
Solicitud enviada a [ONLINEID].\n Esperando la aprobación de tu pareja...
Request sent to [ONLINEID].\n Waiting for your partner's approval...
You have invited [ONLINEID]\n Waiting for the person to reply...
[ONLINEID]님에게 참가를 신청하였습니다\n 상대의 승낙을 기다리고 있습니다…
你邀請了[ONLINEID]\n 正在等候對手回覆…
你邀請了[ONLINEID]\n 正在等候對手回覆…
七夕フライトに参加するには 特定のアイテムが必要です\n アイテムについてはフライトゲーム起動時に表示される\n 「七夕フライトに参加するには」をごらん下さい

Du brauchst einen bestimmten Gegenstand, um am Tanabata-Flug teilnehmen zu können.\nWenn du wissen möchtest, welcher Gegenstand das ist, schau unter "Wie du am Tanabata-Flug teilnimmst"\nnach. Es wird am Anfang des Spiels angezeigt.
To participate in Tanabata Flight, certain items are required.\nTo check the items, please take a look at "How to participate in Tanabata Flight,"\nwhich is displayed when a flight game is started.

Pour participer au vol de la Tanabata, un objet particulier est nécessaire.\nPour vérifier, veuillez consulter l'explication "Comment participer à un vol de la Tanabata,"\nqui s'affiche lorsque vous commencez un jeu de vol.

Per partecipare al Volo di Tanabata sono richiesti alcuni oggetti.\nPer controllare quali oggetti sono richiesti, controllare la sezione "Come partecipare al Volo di Tanabata",\nvisualizzata nella schermata che compare prima di un evento in volo.

Para participar en el vuelo de Tanabata, es necesario disponer de ciertos artículos.\nPara saber cuáles son, echa un vistazo a "Cómo participar en el vuelo de Tanabata",\nque se mostrará al comienzo del juego de vuelo.
To participate in Tanabata Flight, certain items are required.\nTo check the items, please take a look at "How to participate in Tanabata Flight,"\nwhich is displayed when a flight game is started.
To participate in Tanabata Flight, certain items are required.\nTo check the items, please take a look at "How to participate in Tanabata Flight,"\nwhich is displayed when a flight game is started.
To participate in Tanabata Flight, certain items are required.\nTo check the items, please take a look at "How to participate in Tanabata Flight,"\nwhich is displayed when a flight game is started.
To participate in Tanabata Flight, certain items are required.\nTo check the items, please take a look at "How to participate in Tanabata Flight,"\nwhich is displayed when a flight game is started.
To participate in Tanabata Flight, certain items are required.\nTo check the items, please take a look at "How to participate in Tanabata Flight,"\nwhich is displayed when a flight game is started.

しばらくお待ちください

Si prega di attendere(Persone in coda: %s)
Por favor, espere(%s personas en la cola).
Please wait(No. of people in the lobby: %s)
Please wait(No. of people in the lobby: %s)
参加が了承されませんでした
Votre requête n'a pas été acceptée.
La tua richiesta non è stata accettata.
参加が了承されませんでした
Votre requête n'a pas été acceptée.
La tua richiesta non è stata accettata.
ふたりでフライト：一緒に飛ぶパートナーをつのる
Als Paar fliegen: Nach einem Partner suchen
Fly as a pair: Search for a partner
Voler en paire : Rechercher un partenaire
Vola in coppia: Cerca un compagno
Volar en pareja: Buscar una pareja
Fly as a pair: Search for a partner
Enjoy the flight in a pair: Wait someone to join
ふたりでフライト：パートナーを探している人に参加を申し込む
Als Paar fliegen: Um gemeinsamen Flug bitten
Fly as a pair: Request to join
Voler en paire : demande de rejoindre
Vola in coppia: Richiesta di partecipazione
Volar en pareja: Solicitar un vuelo
Fly as a pair: Request to join
Enjoy the flight in a pair: Apply for flight
おつかれさまでした！\nこんどは 誰かと一緒にふたりでフライトを楽しんでみませんか？

Danke, dass du mitgespielt hast!\n
Wie wär's, versuch doch das nächste Mal mit jemandem zusammen als Paar zu fliegen?

Thank you for playing!\n
Next time, why don't you enjoy flying together with someone as a pair?

Merci d'avoir joué !\n
La prochaine fois, pourquoi ne pas profiter d'un vol ensemble avec quelqu'un en tant que paire ?

Grazie per aver giocato!\n
La prossima volta, perché non partecipi volando in coppia con qualcuno?

¡Gracias por participar!\n
La próxima vez, ¿por qué no disfrutas volando junto a otra persona?
Thank you for playing! \n Next time, why don't you enjoy flying together with someone as a pair?
Thank you very much for joining our event!\n How about inviting someone to enjoy the flight with you next time?

수고하셨습니다!\n
이번에는 누군가와 함께 둘이서 비행을 즐겨 보시지 않겠습니까?
辛苦了！\n 下一次嘗試和其他玩家一同享受二人飛行旅程怎麼樣？
辛苦了！\n 下一次嘗試和其他玩家一同享受二人飛行旅程怎麼樣？
ふたりでフライトゲームに参加すれば 相性がわかったり 記念撮影ができたり\nアイテムがもらえたりします！ ぜひとも 参加してみてください！
Wenn du mit jemandem zusammen fliegst, könnt ihr eure Affinität testen, Erinnerungsfotos schießen und Gegenstände erhalten! \n Wir legen dir ans Herz, es mal zu versuchen!
If you fly with someone else, you can know your affinity, take commemorative photos and receive items! \n We encourage you to try!
Si vous volez avec quelqu'un d'autre, vous pouvez connaître votre affinité, prendre des photos commémoratives et recevoir des objets ! \n Nous vous encourageons à essayer !
Volando con qualcuno, potrai conoscere la vostra affinità, scattare foto ricordo e ricevere oggetti! \n Ti invitiamo a fare un tentativo!
Si vuelas con otra persona, podrás conocer vuestra afinidad, sacar fotos de recuerdo y recibir artículos!\n ¡Te animamos a volar!
If you fly with someone else, you can know your affinity, take commemorative photos and receive items! \nWe encourage you to try!
If you join the flight in a pair, you can know how well the two of you are suited, take photos or even be able to get items!\nCome and join!
둘이서 플라이트 게임에 참가하면 애호를 알 수 있고, 기념 촬영을 하거나\n 아이템을 받을 수 있습니다! 부디 참가해 보세요!
參加二人飛行旅程，你可以知道你們的姻親、拍攝記念照片、甚至有機會獲得獎品！\n 請務必要參加！
參加二人飛行旅程，你可以知道你們的姻親、拍攝記念照片、甚至有機會獲得獎品！\n 請務必要參加！
おつかれさまでした！\n今回のフライトで集めてきた星のかけらは 以下の通りです
Gut gemacht!\nDieses Mal hast du die folgenden Sternenfragmente gesammelt:
Well done!\nThis time, you collected the following star fragments.
